body:
* Feature request
For YugabyteDB instantiation, provide a way to passthrough a gflag to cluster instantiation
https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/master/cluster/examples/kubernetes/yugabytedb/cluster.yaml
For example:
yb-master --replication_factor=1

@arnav15

*Use case*
For test/dev environments to use fewer resources, PVs, allow RF=1 instead of default RF=3 so that only single replicas of master/tserver are created.
<code snip for clusteryaml>
spec:
  master:
    # Replica count for Master.
    replicas: 1 <-- Default is 3

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
Start cluster via attached cluster.yaml
kubectl exec -n rook-yugabytedb -it yb-tserver-hello-ybdb-cluster-0 /home/yugabyte/bin/cqlsh

"RF1 error"
cqlsh> CREATE KEYSPACE test WITH replication = {'class': 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor' : 1};
cqlsh> describe keyspace test

CREATE KEYSPACE test2 WITH replication = {'class': 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor': '3'}  AND durable_writes = true;

cqlsh> create table test.mytable (ID uuid PRIMARY KEY);
InvalidRequest: Error from server: code=2200 [Invalid query] message="Invalid Table Definition. Error creating table test.mytable on the master: Not enough live tablet servers to create table with replication factor 3. 1 tablet servers are alive.
create table test.mytable (ID uuid PRIMARY KEY);
                 ^^^^^^^^
 (error -302)"
[cluster.yaml.txt](https://github.com/rook/rook/files/4031852/cluster.yaml.txt)
title: Feature request: gflag passthrough for YugabyteDB
